title: Vegetable prices spike in Keppetipola
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The prices of upcountry vegetables at the Keppetipola Economic Center have increased due to the shortage of fertilizer & pesticides, Secretary to the Economic Center Mahinda Ratnayaka said.
Accordingly the new prices of a few vegetables are as follows:
